metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4945 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 29.0.0.171 and earlier have a Type Confusionvulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary codeexecution in the context of the current user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4945` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 30.0.0.113ubuntu0.18.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 30.0.0.113ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '30.0.0.113ubuntu0.18.04.1').
